title: Prevalence of undernourishment worldwide 2000 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Proportion of undernourished people, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2000.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2015.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2018 to 2017.
gold: The statistic shows the prevalence of undernourishment in the world population from 2000 to 2018 . In 2018 , about 10.8 percent of the world population were undernourished .
